inclusion.criterion: extensive intraductal carcinoma confirmed by hollow needle biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the lesion not involving the nipple as confirmed by enhanced MR imaging of the breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bra cup size: B or higher
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The cutting edge of nipple-areola complex tested positive for extensive intraductal carcinoma twice
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
